languages.text: "Ты нужен мне, Абеляр. Надеюсь, произошедшее не повлияет на твою преданность Вольному Торговцу".
"I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Ты нужен мне, Абеляр. Надеюсь, произошедшее не повлияет на твою преданность Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."
"I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."
"I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."
"I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: «Le necesito, Abelard. Confío en que lo sucedido no afecte a su lealtad hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Le necesito, Abelard. Confío en que lo sucedido no afecte a su lealtad hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「お前が必要だ、アベラルド。今回のことで、自由開拓者への忠誠心が揺らいでいないことを願っている」
languages.original_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が必要だ、アベラルド。今回のことで、自由開拓者への忠誠心が揺らいでいないことを願っている」

languages.text: “我需要你，阿贝拉德。我希望之前发生的事情，不会影响你对行商浪人的忠诚。”
languages.original_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我需要你，阿贝拉德。我希望之前发生的事情，不会影响你对行商浪人的忠诚。”

languages.text: « J'ai besoin de vous, Abélard. J'espère que ce qui s'est produit n'affectera pas votre loyauté envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai besoin de vous, Abélard. J'espère que ce qui s'est produit n'affectera pas votre loyauté envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Ich brauche Euch, Abelard. Ich hoffe, dass das Erlebte sich nicht auf Eure Loyalität gegenüber {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} auswirken wird."
languages.original_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich brauche Euch, Abelard. Ich hoffe, dass das Erlebte sich nicht auf Eure Loyalität gegenüber {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} auswirken wird."

languages.text: "Sen bana lazımsın Abelard. Hadiselerin Hür Tacir'e olan sadakatini etkilemeyeceğini umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I need you, Abelard. I hope that what has happened will not affect your loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Sen bana lazımsın Abelard. Hadiselerin Hür Tacir'e olan sadakatine tesir etmeyeceğini umuyorum."
